flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction:
How to Repair Nintendo DS Lite (NDSL) Game Slot

I would say to remember that this not an easy repair as it involves soldering the slots, so you might not want to do it all yourself because you might mess things up. If you wish, you can get your unit repaired at Nintendo Repair Shop.

Find cheap original Nintendo game slot repair parts at the Nintendo DS Repair Shop Inc., along with any other Nintendo DS Lite repair parts you may need.

You will also need soldering skills for this repair.

Stay tuned for more Nintendo DS Repair Shop tutorials, for any comments or any questions about NDS Lite Game Slot Repair. Thanks for watching.

guide.summary: Step-by-step guide to repairing the damaged game slot of your Nintendo DS Lite (NDSL) from disassembling your NDSL to soldering the damaged game slot and putting the assembly back together again.
guide.title: Repair Nintendo DS Lite (NDSL) Game Slot
